name: Peacekeeper: Probable Cause
description:
As deputy you have jobs that need doing, so load up those chambers and give them a spin. 

The more bullets you load the better your chance at success is. But you’ll need more than luck to last in this town, head to the store and pick up a few items that should keep you in the game longer. 

How many days will you last?

Dev's longest run: 12 Days.
